record.title: THANKING THE PRESIDING OFFICER AND STAFF
record.narrative:
THANKING THE PRESIDING OFFICER AND STAFF -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4705]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, first of all, let me express my appreciation to you for your patience and, of course, all the staff. We have been trying to get where we are. It has been a long night. Hopefully, this is pointing us in the right direction.
